section.title: customers warning for lateness Update Late Customer Credit Status
section.para: The system can be configured to place Customers on credit warning when their A/R open items become past due. Instructions for setting up that configuration can be found here: . To take full advantage of this functionality, you will need to regularly run the Update Late Customer Credit Status utility.

note.para: This utility will be hidden if your system is not configured to place Customers on credit warning when their A/R open items become past due.

section.para: When run, this utility will review all late A/R open items for all Customers. Any Customers found to have late items falling outside the grace period will be placed on credit warning.
